languages.text: "Прошу простить. Это не повторится". {n}Напряженная поза Соломона чуть расслабляется, на лице возникает тень странного облегчения.{/n} "Разрешите идти".

traits.locale_text: это не повторится будто с облегчением

languages.text: "Please forgive me. It won't happen again." {n}Solomorne's tense posture relaxes slightly, a shadow of strange relief on his face.{/n} "If you will excuse me."
languages.original_text: "Прошу простить. Это не повторится". {n}Напряженная поза Соломона чуть расслабляется, на лице возникает тень странного облегчения.{/n} "Разрешите идти".

traits.locale_text: "Please forgive me. It won't happen again." {n}Solomorne's tense posture relaxes slightly, a shadow of strange relief on his face.{/n} "If you will excuse me."
"Please forgive me. It won't happen again." {n}Solomorne's tense posture relaxes slightly, a shadow of strange relief on his face.{/n} "If you will excuse me."
"Please forgive me. It won't happen again." {n}Solomorne's tense posture relaxes slightly, a shadow of strange relief on his face.{/n} "If you will excuse me."
"Please forgive me. It won't happen again." {n}Solomorne's tense posture relaxes slightly, a shadow of strange relief on his face.{/n} "If you will excuse me."
"Please forgive me. It won't happen again." {n}Solomorne's tense posture relaxes slightly, a shadow of strange relief on his face.{/n} "If you will excuse me."

languages.text: 「お許しください。二度とこんなことはしません」{n}ソロモーンの緊張した姿勢がわずかに緩み、顔に奇妙な安堵の影が差した。{/n}「それでは失礼いたします」
languages.original_text: "Please forgive me. It won't happen again." {n}Solomorne's tense posture relaxes slightly, a shadow of strange relief on his face.{/n} "If you will excuse me."

traits.locale_text: 「お許しください。二度とこんなことはしません」{n}ソロモーンの緊張した姿勢がわずかに緩み、顔に奇妙な安堵の影が差した。{/n}「それでは失礼いたします」

languages.text: "Bitte vergebt mir. Es wird nicht wieder vorkommen." {n}Solomornes steife Körperhaltung entspannt sich ein wenig, auf seinem Gesicht liegt ein merkwürdiger Schatten von Erleichterung.{/n} "Wenn Ihr mich nun entschuldigt."
languages.original_text: "Please forgive me. It won't happen again." {n}Solomorne's tense posture relaxes slightly, a shadow of strange relief on his face.{/n} "If you will excuse me."

traits.locale_text: "Bitte vergebt mir. Es wird nicht wieder vorkommen." {n}Solomornes steife Körperhaltung entspannt sich ein wenig, auf seinem Gesicht liegt ein merkwürdiger Schatten von Erleichterung.{/n} "Wenn Ihr mich nun entschuldigt."

languages.text: « Pardonnez-moi. Ça ne se reproduira pas. » {n}La posture tendue de Solomorne se relâche quelque peu et l'ombre d'un étrange soulagement apparaît sur son visage.{/n} « Si vous voulez bien m'excuser... »
languages.original_text: "Please forgive me. It won't happen again." {n}Solomorne's tense posture relaxes slightly, a shadow of strange relief on his face.{/n} "If you will excuse me."

traits.locale_text: « Pardonnez-moi. Ça ne se reproduira pas. » {n}La posture tendue de Solomorne se relâche quelque peu et l'ombre d'un étrange soulagement apparaît sur son visage.{/n} « Si vous voulez bien m'excuser... »

languages.text: «Le ruego que me disculpe. No volverá a suceder». {n}La tensa postura de Solomorne se relaja ligeramente, y su rostro insinúa una peculiar sensación de alivio.{/n} «Con su permiso».
languages.original_text: "Please forgive me. It won't happen again." {n}Solomorne's tense posture relaxes slightly, a shadow of strange relief on his face.{/n} "If you will excuse me."

traits.locale_text: «Le ruego que me disculpe. No volverá a suceder». {n}La tensa postura de Solomorne se relaja ligeramente, y su rostro insinúa una peculiar sensación de alivio.{/n} «Con su permiso».

languages.text: “请原谅我，这种事情再也不会发生了。”{n}索罗蒙紧张的姿势稍微放松了些，表情看起来仿佛如释重负。{/n}“请允许我告退。”
languages.original_text: "Please forgive me. It won't happen again." {n}Solomorne's tense posture relaxes slightly, a shadow of strange relief on his face.{/n} "If you will excuse me."

traits.locale_text: “请原谅我，这种事情再也不会发生了。”{n}索罗蒙紧张的姿势稍微放松了些，表情看起来仿佛如释重负。{/n}“请允许我告退。”

languages.text: "Bağışlayın. Tekrar olmayacak." {n}Solomorne'un gergin duruşu biraz gevşiyor, yüzünde tuhaf bir rahatlama beliriyor.{/n} "Müsaadenizle."
languages.original_text: "Please forgive me. It won't happen again." {n}Solomorne's tense posture relaxes slightly, a shadow of strange relief on his face.{/n} "If you will excuse me."

traits.locale_text: "Lütfen affedin. Tekrar etmeyecek." {n}Solomorne'un gergin duruşu biraz gevşer, yüzünde tuhaf bir rahatlama belirir.{/n} "Müsaadenizle."

languages.original_text: "Please forgive me. It won't happen again." {n}Solomorne's tense posture relaxes slightly, a shadow of strange relief on his face.{/n} "If you will excuse me."
